TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpClientChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpClientChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type TcpClientChannel = class interface IChannelSender interface IChannel interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫，實作使用 TCP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的用戶端通道。

span.span: For remote calls, implements a client channel that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道會傳輸郵件，跨越遠端界限 （例如，電腦或應用程式定義域）。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains). 類別將使用 TCP 通訊協定的訊息傳輸。The class transports messages using the TCP protocol. .NET Framework 遠端基礎結構會使用通道來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然後，它會還原序列化，並處理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是經由伺服器通道，且由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要執行額外處理的訊息上用戶端，您可以指定的實作透過其中所處理的所有訊息的介面傳遞。To perform additional processing of messages on the client side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the are passed. 根據預設，類別會使用二進位格式子，將所有訊息都序列化。By default, the class uses a binary formatter to serialize all messages. A物件中具有相關聯的組態屬性可以在設定執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱文件。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別來呼叫遠端型別。The following code example shows the use of the class to call a remote type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/client.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/client.cs#20)] 在上述範例中稱為遠端型別是由下列程式碼定義。The remote type called in the example above is defined by the following code. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/remotable.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/remotable.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此建構函式建立與特定的組態屬性的物件。The following code example shows the use of this constructor to create a object with specific configuration properties. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpAuth#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CPP/client.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpAuth#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CS/client.cs#31)]

exception.span: 組態屬性的格式不正確。

span.span: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊多個通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構。The following code example shows how to construct a . [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#31)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先順序會控制競爭的用戶端連線到指定的端點; 中的順序較低優先順序通道前，連線更高的優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 預設優先權為 1;允許使用負數的優先順序。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/client.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/client.cs#22)]

span.span: The URL to which the new sink delivers messages.
Can be .

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 遠端主機的通道資料物件，新接收應該將訊息傳遞至遠端主機。

span.span: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.
Can be .

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，包含新通道訊息接收的 URI，此 URI 傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 通道訊息接收，會傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回通道訊息接收傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收器做為目標。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 請`url`或是`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此方法。The following code example shows the use this method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#32)]
